page.title: 12Fawley Refinery
page.content: The refinery is a dominant feature of our area and covers five square kilometres.We phoned{Esso}up to see if the man in charge could give us some information.He was very helpful but some things were confidential. A refinery was built in{1921.}After the 2nd world war Esso took over.They bought the land and they expanded.Esso refines oil.They make diesel oil,gas, petrol and Bitumen.The oil comes in by ships from the oil rigs in the north sea.9,000 tons of oil comes in a day,15,000 million tons a year.The oil goes out by pipe to the places where it is needed. 14,000 people work in Esso chemicals and 700 work in Esso.Esso chemicals was formed in 1960.It has a marine terminal where tankers drop off their cargo.Esso's head office is in Victoria St. London.
